title: Barrister Danyal strongly condemns Israeli aggression against Iran
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP): Parliamentary Secretary Barrister Danyal Chaudhry, on Friday vehemently condemned Israel’s unjustified military aggression against Iran, calling it “a grave threat to regional and international peace.”
He congratulated the nation on the National Assembly’s unanimous resolution passed earlier today, denouncing Israeli terrorism in the Middle East.
In his statement, Barrister Chaudhry emphasized, “Pakistan stands in unwavering solidarity with Iran, our brotherly Muslim nation that was the first country to recognize Pakistan after independence in 1947. This unanimous resolution reflects Pakistan’s united stance against Israeli aggression.”
He urgently called upon the Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC) to convene an emergency session immediately to formulate collective action against Zionist atrocities.
